title: Weekly Digest (13 October, 2019 - 20 October, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 54 issues were created.
Of these, 25 issues have been closed and 29 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #9240 [Fixes #9238](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9240), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:green_heart: #9238 [EIP681 does not support ENS_NAME  ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9238), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #9237 [New e2e tests and fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9237), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9236 [[WIP] [#9037] Error states for new Tx overview: contract & network fees](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9236), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9235 [Amount and Network Fee text overlap in 'Sending' screen when there are long values  ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9235), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9234 ["Remove current photo" is shown for new account and profile info is duplicated in header after any change](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9234), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9233 [Overlapping on some screens (onboarding, wallet -  English, Galaxy S7)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9233), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9231 [Recover a key from seed on keycard: a password is asked to the user (it should not)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9231), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #9230 [[DEBUG] disable signals](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9230), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #9229 [Add a 'reset keycard' feature ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9229), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #9228 [Add an unpairing keycard  feature ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9228), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #9227 [Remove keycard unpairing for v1 ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9227), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #9226 [Styling + add date seed phrase backed up](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9226), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9225 [No filter for transaction history](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9225), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9224 [Implement designs for sign in screens](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9224), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9222 [NFC tapping user experience](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9222), by [andmironov](https://github.com/andmironov)
:green_heart: #9220 [Comment away message.new signal](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9220), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:green_heart: #9217 [Network fee values fetching takes >1 min](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9217), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9216 [Use eth.staging as a default fleet for development and nightlies](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9216), by [adambabik](https://github.com/adambabik)
:green_heart: #9214 [Unpairing card doesn't warn user about consequences and there is no automatic logout after unpairing](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9214), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9213 [ENS addr is checked instead of owner](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9213), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9212 [MacOS app build lacking "notarization"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9212), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9210 [Send transaction page text testnet warning message runs off screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9210), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:green_heart: #9206 [Endless processing spinner after entering wrong PIN when signing message from DApp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9206), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9205 ["Resend" option doesn't resend message on Android](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9205), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9203 [No transaction history when address has a lot (100+) of transactions](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9203), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9201 [A few bugs from the recovery flow (Keycard and seed phrase)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9201), by [andmironov](https://github.com/andmironov)
:green_heart: #9200 [Several Keycard issues while trying to recover an account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9200), by [andmironov](https://github.com/andmironov)
:green_heart: #9195 [Bump @react-native-community/netinfo from 4.2.2 to 4.4.0 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9195), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #9239 [e2e - switching accounts in DApp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9239), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9232 [fix failing TestFlight clean job](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9232), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #9223 [resolve ENS in wallet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9223), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9221 [Disable spinner when generating multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9221), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #9219 [desktop builds need GnuPG, also s3cmd](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9219), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #9218 [add info about MacOS Catalina workaround](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9218), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #9215 [[#8940] Redesign Back, swipe-to-the-left and hardware device Back butâ€¦](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9215), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9211 [Fixed several case ids and add test for checking log_level and fleet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9211), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9209 [Fix #8960](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9209), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:heart: #9208 [fix navigation reset](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9208), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #9207 [Filter for security updates only in Dependabot](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9207), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #9204 [drop les](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9204), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9202 [Small fix to e2e: deleting dapps](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9202), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9199 [Bump react-native-screens from 1.0.0-alpha.22 to 2.0.0-alpha.4 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9199), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9198 [Bump web3-utils from 1.0.0-beta.36 to 1.2.1 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9198), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9197 [Bump events from 1.1.1 to 3.0.0 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9197), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9196 [Bump react-native-fetch-polyfill from 1.1.2 to 1.1.3 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9196), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9194 [Bump metro from 0.48.5 to 0.56.0 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9194), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9193 [Bump react-native-mail from v4.0.0-status to v4.0.0 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9193), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9192 [Bump @babel/generator from 7.0.0 to 7.6.4 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9192), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9191 [Bump status-conan from v1.0.0 to v1.0.1 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9191), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9190 [Bump metro-react-native-babel-preset from 0.45.6 to 0.56.0 in /desktop/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9190), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9189 [Bump react-native-dialogs from 1.0.4 to 1.1.0 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9189), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9188 [Bump react-native from 0.60.5 to 0.60.6 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9188), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
:heart: #9187 [Bump react-dom from 16.4.2 to 16.10.2 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9187), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #9222 [NFC tapping user experience](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9222), by [andmironov](https://github.com/andmironov)
It received :+1: x2, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #9195 [Bump @react-native-community/netinfo from 4.2.2 to 4.4.0 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9195), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)
It received 10 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 26 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 8 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #9237 [New e2e tests and fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9237), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:yellow_heart: #9236 [[WIP] [#9037] Error states for new Tx overview: contract & network fees](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9236), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

:yellow_heart: #9195 [Bump @react-native-community/netinfo from 4.2.2 to 4.4.0 in /mobile/js_files](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9195), by [dependabot-preview[bot]](https://github.com/apps/dependabot-preview)

:yellow_heart: #9086 [keycard pin screen fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9086), by [dmitryn](https://github.com/dmitryn)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 18 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #9239 [e2e - switching accounts in DApp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9239), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #9223 [resolve ENS in wallet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9223), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)

# COMMITS
Last week there were 19 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8940] Redesign Back, swipe-to-the-left and hardware device Back buttons to align the behavior  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/cbe17cbe020189f5d7aaacba2f82da63061e47ac) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [e2e about switching accounts in DApp  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8fc823f94b794db3cefde9d55c7e3b11efb76366) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#8446] [Multi-Account] Build account settings for individual wallet  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1c51731aea85d47633f114f17ed4ef9d6c954efe) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix type of shell used for s3cmd uploads  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/647bde7c6b46faf0eb4bf240457b385255275380) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [customize TMPDIR and clean it  Also: - parallelize upload and achive stages - fix s3cmd uploads for combined Jenkinsfile - fix failing TestFlight clean job  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f28fd8fc9c218000842eda9c9a488cf24869322f) by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:hammer_and_wrench: [combined node package upgrade prs  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b8d3ef3aa50290853b2cc154293a7558e651a7b7) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Filter for security updates only in Dependabot  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d317d8a6c7373872d31348b95e0a1ab773d5bb2d) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [desktop builds need GnuPG  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/afc241251449c5ba33f45157dd9fdead25487d62) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix 8853] fix change of whisper id in ens registration  A user can type in their existing name in the registration flow. Status can confirm if they own it. After signing a transaction, the user can update the Whisper ID to their new one.  Instead of using a hardcoded contract for stateofus, the standard `owner` method is called to find the resolver contract of a ens name. This allows users to set the pubkey even for ens names that are not subdomains of stateofus  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7b6dfad70288e032ded6e5b93da6bde902c7d1b5) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [resolve ENS in wallet  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1f24722db0712edc8e74c9bcc6ce8cbc6984684b) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix navigation reset  currently navigation-reset only works properly if you reset to a simple route  this fix allows us to use navigation reset with more complex routes, by ensuring that the navigation stack is populated properly so that navigate back doesn't end up emptying the stack.  this is temporary as the proper way to do navigation in general would be to get rid of view id and navigation-stack entirely, since it is a duplication of the state of react-navigation  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/500d2cc787ac3cf641d8138bbdba48ce080e5552) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Disable spinner when generating multiaccount  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1314c6e7d76517819f31fbc3fe735cb04e2db7e6) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [add info about MacOS Catalina workaround  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/95e48a41599cfd5b6afe12dc663de2013cb01ccb) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [nix: Upgrade expected Xcode version to 11.1  Also: - nix: Disable symlink store check - Add comments to dependabot config file  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8e90103e96db74b419f8404f968efc946e29e72e) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [drop les  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/da4d95d85c71095fa1223bb3556901c224dfaf00) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Point network to correct current-network  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2ddfcd4f8892f042c855edabe27434c2a2490a33) by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix some testrail links and add new test for checking log_level and fleet  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e88472a0e0246dce7283d252becb696ff0aafc13) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix deleteing dapps  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/114b4da2d9437785f3a3dd4993633e19ef80c22b) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Enable high priority tests in PRs  Also: - add ci/tests/Jenkinsfile.e2e-prs - remove maybe_later_button click after new onboarding - update job name for e2e tests - Fix testrail checklist creationg for nightly builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub SokoÅ‚owski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c872c5c487669a62e278eced570762cc60b9146a) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)

Last week there were no releases.

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
